valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 23 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 24 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Sole 1001 moving slowly southwest losing its identity by midnight tonight. High Sweden 1034 expected Norway 1040 by same time
